code: export const getToken=()=>{return localStorage.getItem('access_token');};export const getUserEmail=()=>{const token=getToken();if(!token)return null;try{const payload=JSON.parse(atob(token.split('.')[1]));return payload.email||null;}catch(_unused){return null;}};export const isAuthenticated=()=>{return!!getToken();};export const logout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('access_token');localStorage.removeItem('refresh_token');};
